Package turing.server

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • turing.server.Document
  • public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a document inside the server

    • Constructor Detail

      • Document

        public Document​(java.lang.String name,
                User creator,
                int sections)
         throws java.io.IOException,
                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                PreExistentDocumentException
        Creates a new document
        Parameters:
        name - the document name
        creator - the document creator
        sections - the number of sections
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a disk error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sections is < 1 or > Server.MAX_SECTIONS
        PreExistentDocumentException - if the document already exists

        Share the document with another user
        Parameters:
        user - the user to share with
        Returns:
